comments: Tests covering the use of the CONVERT_TZ function.

tests.name: convert timezones defined by offset
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (K STRING KEY, time TIMESTAMP) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM TS AS select K, convert_tz(time, '+0200', '+0500') as ts from test;

tests.name: convert timezones defined by name
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (K STRING KEY, time TIMESTAMP) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM TS AS select K, convert_tz(time, 'America/Los_Angeles', 'America/New_York') as ts from test;
